name: Pivot (zlsinger)
description:
This game was created for the "GAMES MADE QUICK??? 1½" 2017 Game Jam. 

Pivot around projectiles and crash into your enemies!

Music is by Grumble Labs via the Unity Asset Store: https://www.assetstore.unity3d...

Sound effects are by SoundGrid via the Unity Asset Store: https://www.assetstore.unity3d...
